gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata Part 2 Extensions for imagery and gridded data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: OISST_UHR_NRT-GOS-L4-MED-v2.0 > Mediterranean Sea Ultra High Resolution SST L4 Analysis 0.01 deg Resolution

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Mediterranean Sea Ultra High Resolution SST L4 Analysis 0.01 deg Resolution

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: CNR MED Sea Surface Temperature provides daily gap-free maps (L4) at 0.01 deg. x 0.01deg. horizontal resolution over the Mediterranean Sea. The data are obtained from infra-red measurements collected by satellite radiometers and statistical interpolation. It is the CMEMS sea surface temperature nominal operational product for the Mediterranean sea.

gmd:keyword.gco:CharacterString: Earth Science>Oceans>Ocean Temperature>Sea Surface Temperature>NONE>NONE>Blended Sea Surface Temperature
